summary: An email sent to SDNY prosecutors on January 30, 2020, from an individual claiming to be stalked and intimidated. The writer alleges a cover-up in the Shannan Gilbert case, connections between attorney John Ray and corrupt officials, and links John Ray to Jeffrey Epstein through Swedish madam Barbro Ehnbom. The writer also describes witnessing intimate interactions between John Ray and prosecutor Toni Spota, and details threats and surveillance they are experiencing.

persons.name: John Ray
persons.role: Attorney for the Estate of Shannan Gilbert
persons.context: Attorney representing the Shannan Gilbert estate; accused by the writer of being placed by Toni Spota to cover up the case rather than zealously defend it; allegedly connected to Jeffrey Epstein through Barbro Ehnbom.

persons.name: Toni Spota
persons.context: Former Suffolk County District Attorney; prosecuted in the Burke/Loeb cover-up trial; accused of placing John Ray on the Gilbert case to cover it up; described sharing intimate looks with John Ray in court.

persons.name: James Burke
persons.context: Former police chief convicted of beating Chris Loeb; alleged to have run a prostitution ring since 1995; possessed duffle bag with snuff film and child pornography DVDs.

persons.name: Chris Loeb
persons.context: Man beaten by James Burke after stealing Burke's duffle bag; witnessed contents of 7 DVDs in the bag, described as snuff films and child pornography; suffers from severe PTSD.

persons.name: Shannan Gilbert
persons.context: Escort whose death is the subject of a lawsuit and alleged cover-up; her estate is represented by John Ray.

persons.name: Mari Gilbert
persons.context: Mother of Shannan Gilbert; allegedly told by John Ray he would 'line her rockets with Hackett's money'; deceased.

persons.name: Michael Pak
persons.context: Alleged Asian sex trafficker; driver for Shannan Gilbert; the writer provided intel on him to the FBI/SDNY.

persons.name: Joe Scalise
persons.context: Individual who told the writer his family secretly paid John Ray $25,000 cash in the Shannan Gilbert lawsuit; alleged by the writer to be involved in Gilbert's murder and cover-up.

persons.name: Barbro Ehnbom
persons.context: Swedish woman allegedly connected to Jeffrey Epstein; John Ray is connected to her through his life partner, Madeleine Kristoffersson.

persons.name: Chris McPartland
persons.context: Co-defendant with Toni Spota in the obstruction trial related to the Burke/Loeb cover-up.

persons.name: Andrew J. Maloney, III
persons.context: The writer's attorney; advised the writer to report John Ray to the bar association.

persons.name: Tricia Burton
persons.context: Private investigator on John Ray's Shannan Gilbert team; told the writer that Ray lied in a meeting.

persons.name: Loretta Lynch
persons.context: Former Attorney General; credited by the writer as the reason Spota and McPartland were prosecuted after hearing her voice on illegal wiretaps.

persons.name: Judge Edward Korman
persons.context: Judge who sentenced Akeem Cruz to prison for the Mann Act.

persons.name: Akeem Cruz
persons.context: Individual sentenced by Judge Korman under the Mann Act.

persons.name: Madeleine Kristoffersson
persons.context: Opera singer in Sweden, life partner of John Ray; connected to Barbro Ehnbom.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named in Epstein's black book; her name appears next to 'John Kay' in the book according to the writer.

persons.name: James Hickey
persons.context: Named as being in place to cover up the Burke beat down of Chris Loeb.

persons.name: Emily Constant
persons.context: Named as being in place to cover up the Burke beat down of Chris Loeb.

persons.name: Peter Crusco
persons.context: Named as being in place to cover up the Burke beat down of Chris Loeb.

persons.name: Taryn Merkl
persons.context: Named as being in place to cover up the Burke beat down of Chris Loeb.

persons.name: Ross McCormack
persons.context: Named as being in place to cover up the Burke beat down of Chris Loeb.

persons.name: Elroy S.
persons.context: Mari Gilbert's boyfriend who provided information about phone calls between Hackett and Mari Gilbert.

persons.name: Mr. and Mrs. Scalise
persons.context: Parents of Joe Scalise; witnessed Michael Pak on the phone with the writer and allegedly called John Ray to inform him.

persons.name: Alex Diaz
persons.context: Named alongside Michael Pak as someone the writer gave intel to have prosecuted under the Mann Act.

connections.description: Alleged intimate connection; writer claims Spota placed Ray on the Gilbert case to cover it up, and they shared loving looks in court.
Connected through Ray's life partner, Madeleine Kristoffersson; Ray allegedly gave a talk linking himself to Ehnbom and Jeffrey Epstein.
Writer believes Ray is in the 'inner circle' of Burke, Spota, and McPartland, and already knew the content of Burke's DVDs.
Spota represented Burke in the past; both are central figures in the alleged cover-up of the Burke/Loeb beating and DVD contents.
Scalise family allegedly paid John Ray $25,000 cash secretly in the Shannan Gilbert lawsuit, making them a third party able to influence him.
Burke beat Loeb after Loeb stole and watched DVDs from Burke's duffle bag, which contained snuff films and child pornography.
Ray is the attorney representing the estate of Shannan Gilbert, though the writer alleges this representation is fraudulent.
Ray was attorney for Mari Gilbert, Shannan's mother; allegedly promised to 'line her rockets with Hackett's money'.

events.title: Intimate Look in Courtroom
events.description: Writer witnesses John Ray and Toni Spota exchanging 'deeply, lovingly' intimate looks in Judge Azrack's courtroom during the Spota/McPartland trial summation.

events.title: Burke Beat Down of Chris Loeb
events.description: Suffolk County Police Chief James Burke beats Chris Loeb after Loeb steals and watches DVDs from Burke's duffle bag.

events.title: Meeting with John Ray
events.description: Writer meets John Ray to discuss the Shannan Gilbert case; Ray asks writer to be on his team.

events.title: Joe Scalise Reveals Secret Payment
events.description: Joe Scalise tells the writer that his parents paid John Ray $25,000 cash secretly in the Shannan Gilbert lawsuit.

events.title: Mafia Thug Intimidation at Courthouse
events.description: Writer is confronted by a suspected mafia thug with a recorder at the Central Islip courthouse, who makes a threatening comment implying surveillance.

events.title: John Ray Talk at Sackem Library
events.description: John Ray gives a talk connecting himself to Jeffrey Epstein via Barbro Ehnbom and his life partner Madeleine Kristoffersson.

locations: Judge Azrack's court room (likely in Central Islip or nearby federal court)
New York State Anti Trafficking Coalition (meeting location)
Sackem Library (location of John Ray's talk)
Sweden (connected to Barbro Ehnbom and John Ray's travels)
NYC, NY (John Ray's apartment with concierge)
keyFacts: The writer alleges attorney John Ray was placed on the Shannan Gilbert case by corrupt prosecutor Toni Spota not to zealously represent the estate, but to cover up the case.
The writer claims John Ray is connected to Jeffrey Epstein through Swedish madam Barbro Ehnbom via Ray's life partner, Madeleine Kristoffersson.
Chris Loeb witnessed 7 DVDs in James Burke's duffle bag, describing 5 as snuff films showing choking, torture, rape, and killing of girls, and 2 as child pornography.
Joe Scalise revealed his family secretly paid John Ray $25,000 cash in the Shannan Gilbert lawsuit, allegedly making them a third party with influence.
The writer describes being stalked, intimidated, and surveilled by individuals they believe are mafia thugs connected to SCPD, including having their home and mail compromised.
